name: Solar System (itch) (SAMREYBEN)
description:
This is my version of the Solar System Project, with the following modifications:

  1. Replace of the comets with a new UFO model, with its own sound effect and slightly different tail effect.
  2. The whole solar system with the 9 planets and the sun.
  3. A close representation of the scale the actual solar system has, taking into account the size of each planet and the sun, and the distance among themselves, based in real data collected from the internet.
  4. Orbit speeds were also modified to represent as close as possible the behaviour of the real solar system, having being obtained through some mathematical scale operations based in data collected from the internet.
  5. Some new sound effects for planets and the UFO.
  6. A wider view in both cameras to be able to fit the new scale.

Disclaimer

The UFO 3D model, its textures and the sound effects used for the completion of this project have been taken from free licensed websites. All credit to their respective creators.
